name: Propz Service
headline: Integrate your store with Propz platform.
overview: Propz is a technology company pioneer in the application of Artificial Intelligence to leverage retail sales. The combination of CRM, Big Data and Machine Learning, combined with retail expertise, is able to automate multichannel marketing campaigns.
features: Integrate with a Marketing Campaign Automation tool
additionalInformation: The final configuration of the app will be done after installing the maeztra.propz-offer app

metricDescription.postPromotion: Confirmation of use of the promotion on Propz
